title: Navigating public, semi-public, and private drug use environments: A qualitative examination of unsheltered homelessness and drug use in Baltimore City
description: Unsheltered people experiencing homelessness (PEH) in the United States (US) have a disproportionately high burden of illegal drug use and overdose. Due to their economic and social marginalization, unsheltered PEH who use drugs are often constrained in where…
